sources.title: The Mummy Strikes (1943)
sources.description: Egyptologists are attacked by mummies, drawing the attention of Superman. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-mummy-strikes-1943/

metadata.Plot: After famed Egyptologist Dr. Jordan is found dead at the foot of King Tut's sarcophagus with a syringe by his side, his assistant Jane Hogan is charged with poisoning him and eventually convicted of murder. At the Daily Planet Clark Kent receives a call from Dr. Wilson of the Egyptian Museum who tells him of the mummy's curse. An examination of the sarcophagus quickly reveals how Dr. Jordan was killed but when King Tut reanimates his personal guards, it will take all of Superman's strength to take the day.
metadata.Director: Izzy Sparber, Dave Fleischer, Myron Waldman
metadata.Writer: Jerry Siegel, Joe Shuster, Jay Morton
metadata.Actors: Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck, Julian Noa
